verses.name: Jeremiah 52:26
verses.text: So Nebuzar–adan the captain of the guard took them, and brought them to the king of Babylon to Riblah.

verses.name: Jeremiah 52:27
verses.text: And the king of Babylon smote them, and put them to death in Riblah in the land of Hamath. Thus Judah was carried away captive out of his own land.

verses.name: Jeremiah 52:28
verses.text: This is the people whom Nebuchadrezzar carried away captive: in the seventh year three thousand Jews and three and twenty:

verses.name: Jeremiah 52:29
verses.text: In the eighteenth year of Nebuchadrezzar he carried away captive from Jerusalem eight hundred thirty and two persons:
